video.title: Leverage
video.synopsis: Backed by thieves and hackers, former insurance investigator Nate Ford pulls a 180 on the corporate and government entities he used to protect.

episodes.synopsis: A desperate aerospace CEO asks Nate to lead a team of expert thieves to recover stolen airplane designs, but Nate learns that the CEO is lying to him.
episodes.title: The Nigerian Job

episodes.synopsis: After Nate and his savvy crew open for business, they help a reservist who was wounded in Iraq by private military contractors with a hidden agenda.
episodes.title: The Homecoming Job

episodes.synopsis: A Wall Street broker burns down his stable to kill his underperforming racehorses, and the team travels to Kentucky to help the heartbroken trainer.
episodes.title: The Two-Horse Job

episodes.synopsis: When the church of Nate's former priest is about to be razed by a profiteering developer, the Leverage team must steal a miracle in order to save it.
episodes.title: The Miracle Job

episodes.synopsis: While working a con on a corrupt judge in a desert town, the team gets caught in the midst of a bank robbery by two desperate and amateur thieves.
episodes.title: The Bank Shot Job

episodes.synopsis: The team hijacks the crew of a horror movie to expose a Serbian adoption agency that's scamming American couples looking to adopt needy orphans.
episodes.title: The Stork Job

episodes.synopsis: To retrieve money promised to a man who took the fall for a Mafia boss, the team poses as the wedding planners for the don's daughter's big day.
episodes.title: The Wedding Job

episodes.synopsis: The team seeks to expose a conglomerate's cover-up of toxic fertilizer, which killed a child, but the CEO has sent the evidence to the Cayman Islands.
episodes.title: The Mile High Job

episodes.synopsis: Nate's drinking jeopardizes the team's attempt to help a National Guardsman fight against the crooked construction firm that foreclosed on his home.
episodes.title: The Snow Job

episodes.synopsis: The team targets an investment broker who swindled a charity, but when they force the mark to enter rehab, they learn he may not be so bad after all.
episodes.title: The 12-Step Job

episodes.synopsis: When Parker serves on a jury to legitimize her alias, she discovers that someone is trying to buy a favorable verdict, and the team is on the case.
episodes.title: The Juror #6 Job

episodes.synopsis: To help Nate, the team targets the CEO of the company that denied medical treatment to Nate's son, and the case involves a Michelangelo maquette.
episodes.title: The First David Job

episodes.synopsis: Nate comes out of hiding to challenge Sterling and Blackpoole, but even more challenging than stealing the statuettes is reuniting his fractured team.
episodes.title: The Second David Job

episodes.synopsis: Six months after getting sober, Nate reassembles his restless team to outwit both the local Irish mob and a banker who is gaming a government bailout.
episodes.title: The Beantown Bailout Job

episodes.synopsis: Eliot must save the day when the crew is exposed while conning a corrupt mixed martial arts promoter into investing his money in a fake cable network.
episodes.title: The Tap Out Job

episodes.synopsis: To trick a convicted felon into revealing the location of his loot, the team takes over a hospital floor and stages the outbreak of a deadly virus.
episodes.title: The Order 23 Job

episodes.synopsis: While trying to recover cash from a Madoff-like manager, the team finds themselves acting as unlikely saviors to the mark's lovable loser stepson.
episodes.title: The Fairy Godparents Job

episodes.synopsis: The crew dives into the paranoid world of government conspiracies to expose a heartless tabloid newscaster as a fraud.
episodes.title: The Three Days of the Hunter Job

episodes.synopsis: Nate and the team put on a magic show to infiltrate the tight security of a corporation responsible for knowingly putting tainted food on the market.
episodes.title: The Top Hat Job

episodes.synopsis: The Leverage team is forced to go head-to-head against another crew of thieves in order to retrieve their clients' priceless artwork.
episodes.title: The Two Live Crew Job

episodes.synopsis: Hardison's failed attempt to play the inside man in a con against a diamond merchant forces the team to break into the most secure vault in Boston.
episodes.title: The Iceman Job

episodes.synopsis: When the team tracks a greedy lawyer angling to rip off a rich client, Parker takes the lead, transforming herself into the man's estranged daughter.
episodes.title: The Lost Heir Job

episodes.synopsis: The crew's attempt to enter the fashion industry and con a sweatshop owner is complicated by a new team member and the mark's involvement with Triads.
episodes.title: The Runway Job

episodes.synopsis: When a loan shark tries to take over McRory's Pub, the Leverage team resorts to the classic "wire" con, with a little over an hour to pull it off.
episodes.title: The Bottle Job

episodes.synopsis: Nate's ex-wife Maggie is framed for a jewel theft in Kiev, and the team must work with an old adversary to save her.
episodes.title: The Zanzibar Marketplace Job

episodes.synopsis: The crew goes after a ruthless grifter posing as a psychic but are stymied when an ex-con kidnaps him to divine the location of some stolen goods.
episodes.title: The Future Job

episodes.synopsis: When a police officer is shot while investigating a corrupt mayor, the team steps in to finish his play but are stunned by the mark's true motives.
episodes.title: The Three Strikes Job

episodes.synopsis: While being pursued by both enemies and law enforcement, the team hides in plain sight to complete a con of the mayor and his gunrunning partner.
episodes.title: The Maltese Falcon Job

episodes.synopsis: While Nate is in a supermax prison, he must work with the team to escape in order to unmask the prison's corrupt warden and to save an inmate.
episodes.title: The Jailhouse Job

episodes.synopsis: The team goes undercover during a high school reunion to get a critical password from a powerful software executive.
episodes.title: The Reunion Job

episodes.synopsis: While working a theft on behalf of her mentor, Parker becomes trapped in an unknown location and the team races to find her.
episodes.title: The Inside Job

episodes.synopsis: Hardison takes up the violin and joins the symphony as part of the team's plan to rob the vault of a corrupt government official from Africa.
episodes.title: The Scheherazade Job

episodes.synopsis: A corrupt CEO plans to release a killer drug onto the populace, so the team enters the world of Big Pharma to take him down. Also, Parker gets jealous when Hardison spends more time with the client and finds it hard to express how she feels to him.
episodes.title: The Double-Blind Job

episodes.synopsis: To con a corrupt record executive, the Leverage crew infiltrates the world of country music, inadvertently turning Eliot into a genuine star.
episodes.title: The Studio Job

episodes.synopsis: Sophie, Parker and Nate work to take down a con man using his collection agency to fund a private revolution. Unknown to them, his militia have taken Eliot and Hardison captive.
episodes.title: The Gone-Fishin' Job

episodes.synopsis: The team takes on a used-car dealership stocked with stolen vehicles.
episodes.title: The Boost Job

episodes.synopsis: Nate leads the team into battle against his father, the great Jimmy Ford, who's running a scheme involving bank robberies and the Russian and Irish mobs.
episodes.title: The Three-Card Monte Job

episodes.synopsis: The team takes on a corrupt coal mine owner working with a dirty politician.
episodes.title: The Underground Job

episodes.synopsis: While discussing the solo crimes they committed as independent thieves, the team members each reminisce about a particular night five years earlier, when it turns out they each unwittingly tried to steal the same artifact at the same time.
episodes.title: The Rashomon Job

episodes.synopsis: The team heads to London after they discover that an antiquities trafficker who works for Damien Moreau is using refugee children to smuggle artifacts; Sophie confronts the consequences of her past.
episodes.title: The King George Job

episodes.synopsis: The team must get a former star hockey player turned crooked investor to give up his knowledge of Damien Moreau's financial dealings before he fulfills an immunity agreement by testifying before a grand jury the next day.
episodes.title: The Morning After Job

episodes.synopsis: The team is hired by a former mall Santa to investigate the mall's owner. In the process, they discover that he is working with an old adversary, Hardison's rival hacker Chaos, to rob the Federal Depository.
episodes.title: The Ho, Ho, Ho Job

episodes.synopsis: When the Italian tells the team that Damien Moreau is on his way to Washington, they must form a plan to prevent Moreau from selling a bomb at an auction. Eliot reveals to the team that he once worked for Moreau.
episodes.title: The Big Bang Job

episodes.synopsis: After Moreau escapes to San Lorenzo, the team follows him and must pose as election consultants for an honest and hardworking politician in order to overthrow the current president of the country and take down Moreau once and for all.
episodes.title: The San Lorenzo Job

episodes.synopsis: To take down a corrupt financier, the team must recover lost evidence high on a mountain while trying to outrun hired guns and killer weather.
episodes.title: The Long Way Down Job

episodes.synopsis: When the mark is killed in the middle of a sting, the team must scramble to complete the con and find the killer before Nate goes down for murder.
episodes.title: The 10 Li'l Grifters Job

episodes.synopsis: To take down a corrupt public relations consultant, the team must build him up as a hero -- and then use his methods against him.
episodes.title: The 15 Minutes Job

episodes.synopsis: On the trail of a lost Van Gogh, the team learns the painting was the center of a World War II romance between a black soldier and a white heiress.
episodes.title: The Van Gogh Job

episodes.synopsis: The team infiltrates the corrupt world of corporate agriculture to recover a stolen object worth millions: a one-of-a-kind potato.
episodes.title: The Hot Potato Job

episodes.synopsis: The team infiltrates a high-tech home to steal a revolutionary computer chip. During the heist, the family's child is abducted from a carnival.
episodes.title: The Carnival Job

episodes.synopsis: The crew sets their sights on a funeral director who embezzles money from grieving mourners and sells the identities of the deceased to a drug cartel.
episodes.title: The Grave Danger Job

episodes.synopsis: When the team goes up against a con man from a long line of greats, they must pull off the biggest scam of their careers.
episodes.title: The Boiler Room Job

episodes.synopsis: When an ailing defense contractor steals a heart on its way to a 15-year-old recipient, the team races against the clock to recover it in time.
episodes.title: The Cross My Heart Job

episodes.synopsis: Sterling persuades the team to help steal a nuclear-reactor component from a high-tech Dubai skyscraper during an international chess tournament.
episodes.title: The Queen's Gambit Job

episodes.synopsis: When homeless veterans in the Boston area begin disappearing, the team goes back to college to infiltrate the world of Skull & Bones secret societies.
episodes.title: The Experimental Job

episodes.synopsis: Exposing a simple embezzlement scam is anything but simple when the team becomes part of a documentary filming at the company they're trying to save.
episodes.title: The Office Job

episodes.synopsis: When a thief targets Parker's friend, the women of Leverage tail the crook to the Venezuelan consulate, where they uncover an international conspiracy.
episodes.title: The Girls' Night Out Job

episodes.synopsis: Nate, Eliot and Hardison are forced to intervene when Hurley returns, embroiled (with the best of intentions) in a three-way drug deal.
episodes.title: The Boys' Night Out Job

episodes.synopsis: While searching for a philanthropist's missing wife, the team comes up against a ring of grifters running sophisticated "sweetheart scams."
episodes.title: The Lonely Hearts Job

episodes.synopsis: The team hits the recession-driven cash-for-gold trade by targeting a corrupt brother-sister team and leading them through an elaborate treasure hunt.
episodes.title: The Gold Job

episodes.synopsis: When Latimer hires Nate's dad to pull off a heist in a government office, the team stages a fake hostage standoff as the feds blockade the building.
episodes.title: The Radio Job

episodes.synopsis: The team must recruit erstwhile friends and rivals to take down Latimer and a foe from their past.
episodes.title: The Last Dam Job

episodes.synopsis: When a shipping CEO's cost-cutting measures result in a plane crash, the Leverage team cons him into buying the largest plane ever built - the Spruce Goose - in order to expose him before a merger is completed that would put more lives at risk.
episodes.title: The (Very) Big Bird Job

episodes.synopsis: While trying to save a stubborn hockey enforcer from sustaining permanent injury in the playoffs, Leverage discovers that someone has nefarious designs on the team.
episodes.title: The Blue Line Job

episodes.synopsis: The Leverage team takes down a wealthy scientist who stole his former research partner's discovery and ruined his reputation; by convincing him he's made first contact with aliens.
episodes.title: The First Contact Job

episodes.synopsis: Leverage goes inside the world of culinary schools and celebrity chefs to bring down a corrupt restaurateur who destroys lives in his pursuit of fame and money.
episodes.title: The French Connection Job

episodes.synopsis: To take down a competitive cheerleading company which profits by putting teenage girls at risk, the team must tackle their most corrupt foe yet: Congress.
episodes.title: The Gimme a K Street Job

episodes.synopsis: A dying FBI Agent's greatest failure - allowing skyjacker D.B. Cooper to escape justice - becomes Nate's obsession, as we flashback to the '70s to solve one of America's great mysteries.
episodes.title: The D.B. Cooper Job

episodes.synopsis: Leverage fakes the discovery of a legendary antique car in order to lure a Wall Street fraudster to break the immunity deal that protects him from prosecution.
episodes.title: The Real Fake Car Job

episodes.synopsis: When a broken leg leaves Parker behind on the crew's latest job, she spies on the Brew Pub's customers for fun and discovers a group of thieves planning a heist.
episodes.title: The Broken Wing Job

episodes.synopsis: When Sophie is implicated in the theft of a valuable painting, Nate must use all his skills as a detective to find the real culprit and clear her name.
episodes.title: The Frame-Up Job

episodes.synopsis: Eliot, Hardison and Parker join Colonel Vance in a race to stop a terrorist from launching a biological attack on Washington, D.C.
episodes.title: The Rundown Job

episodes.synopsis: The Leverage crew sabotages a new big-box megastore in order to stop it from destroying a small town.
episodes.title: The Low Low Price Job

episodes.synopsis: In order to prevent a businessman from destroying his company and the town it supports, the team must run the hardest con in grifter history, The White Rabbit.
episodes.title: The White Rabbit Job

episodes.synopsis: The Leverage team cons a corrupt winery owner out of a priceless bottle of wine.
episodes.title: The Corkscrew Job

episodes.synopsis: The Leverage team creates a global toy craze to take on an unscrupulous toy company CEO who is about to unleash a dangerous toy onto the market in time for Christmas.
episodes.title: The Toy Job

episodes.synopsis: When Nate takes a case linked to his son's death, he leads the team into their riskiest - and deadliest - con yet. By the time it's over, the Leverage team will never be the same again.
episodes.title: The Long Goodbye Job
